title: Bug 49750WebappClassLoader.validate(name) does not validate javax.servlet.
description: Bug 49750WebappClassLoader.validate(name) does not validate javax.servlet. "Validate a classname. As per SRV.9.7.2, we must restrict loading of classes from J2SE (java.) and classes of the servlet API (javax.servlet.)
OB: The method does not validate the class name as described in the method documentation.
